GOLF COURSE RATES
-----------------

RESOLUTION 24-11

​

2025 CITY GOLF COURSE FEES

​

The Pomeroy City Council hereby establishes golf fees for the 2025 year as follows:

​

\*NOTE:  ALL CITY GOLF COURSE YEARLY FEES MUST BE PAID BY APRIL 10TH

​

\*NOTE:  All Golfers must show Annual Pass Card or Daily Receipt if asked.  NO FREE GOLF

​

Annual Adult                                                                             $374.00 

         

Annual Senior (62+)                                                                  $342.00 

         

Family or Couple (2 adults) Pass                                             $662.00          

\*Family (Immediately family only / children under 18)

​

Annual Children, (grade 6 and younger)                                 FREE \*

\* Must be accompanied by dues paying adult; NO unattended kids allowed on Golf Course

​

Annual Jr-Sr High Student (gr. 7-12)                                       $134.00

          

Annual College Student (Current College ID Required)      $134.00

​

Golf Team Members (March - June)                                        FREE

​

Golf Team Members (June - October)                                   $  96.00

​

Daily 9-Holes                                                                            $  16.00   

         

Daily All-day Play Pass                                                             $  22.00    

      

Booklet of 11 passes for 9 Holes                                            $160.00   

       

Golf Course Cart House Fee (Land Rent fee)                       $  60.00     

(does not include mandatory $25.00 annual cart path fee)

​

Daily Cart Path Fee                                                                 $    5.00 per cart ($25.00 maximum)    

 

Annual Path Fee (for all carts)                                                $  25.00    

      

WHO PAYS FOR PATH FEES AT THE GOLF COURSE:

1.  Anyone bringing their carts onto the course from out-of-town.

2.  Carts from Golf Course Cart Houses and the Booster Club Bleacher Houses.

3.  Golfers who drive their carts from home onto the course.

4.  NOTE:  Golfers that walk the course do not pay a path fee.

 

Approved this 18th day of November, 2024:               Attest:

  

\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_                             \_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_

Jack Peasley, Mayor                                                       Diane L Taylor, City Clerk/ Treasurer

​
